primarylang.message: Primary Language - Text will be translated into this language.

description.message: The Social Translate Chrome extension automatically translates event streams and friends' comments on social network sites.

transquility.message: Translation Quality - Should we try harder, but be less accurate?

secondlang.message: Secondary Languages - Text that matches any of your secondary languages will not be translated. This is useful for users who speak multiple languages and would like to have their event streams displayed in several languages.
